B_BACK: Press  to go back to the game.
DEVKITPRO: - For devkitARM, Libctru, Citro2D and Citro3D.
ENTER_PLAYERAMOUNT:
Enter the Playeramount.
2 - 4 Players are the most allowed amount.
EXIT_GAME_PRMPT: Would you like to exit the game?
GAME_INSTR_1:
Press  to roll the dice.
Press START to show the sub menu.
GAME_INSTR_2:
Press  to select a figure.
Press  |  |  |  to switch the figure.
Press START to show the sub menu.
LOAD_FROM_FILE_PROMPT: Would you like to load your last saved game?
NEXT_GAME: Would you like to start another game?
NEW_GAME_PRMPT:
Would you like to start a new game?
You will lose all your current progress.
NOT_VALID_GAME: This is not a valid game.
PLAYERAMOUNT_PRMPT:
If you change the Player amount
the game will be fully restarted.
That means you will lose all your progress.
Do you like to continue?
ROLL_DICE: You need to roll the dice.
RULES_INSTR:
The rules of this game are the following:

Every Player rolls the dice..
If all figures are in the 'house'
then you will need a 6 to get out of the house.
Otherwise you can move all your figures, if possible.

Should you come to another player's figure..
then you can 'kick' the other players figure
and send it back to the house.
Then the other player needs a 6 to get out of the house again.
The winner is.. who can get all their figures in the goal.
SAVE_TO_FILE_PROMPT: Would you like to save your current game?
SELECT_FIGURE: Select the figure you like to set.
